DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the threat submissions and threat submission policies owned by the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read the threat submissions and threat submission policies that you own on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's threat submissions and threat submission policies on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's threat submissions and threat submission policies on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all of the organization's threat submissions
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's threat submissions and to view threat submission policies without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the threat submissions and threat submission policies owned by the signed-in user. Also allows the app to create new threat submissions on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read the threat submissions and threat submission policies that you own. Also allows the app to create new threat submissions on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write all threat submissions
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's threat submissions and threat submission policies on behalf of the signed-in user. Also allows the app to create new threat submissions on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read and write all threat submissions
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's threat submissions and threat submission policies on your behalf. Also allows the app to create new threat submissions on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all of the organization's threat submissions
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's threat submissions and threat submission policies without a signed-in user. Also allows the app to create new threat submissions without a signed-in user.
